0.text: Innate: Periodically, Maokai's next basic attack has an  uncancelable windup and  heals him for 5 − 65 (based on level) (+ 6% − 13% (based on level) maximum health) after a 0.25-second delay.

1.text: Each time Maokai casts an ability or is struck by an enemy's ability, Sap Magic's  cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

2.text: Sap Magic will not activate if Maokai is above 95% maximum  health.

3.text: Sap Magic  resets Maokai's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave that travels forth in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through and  slowing them by 99% for 0.25 seconds.

1.text: Enemies near Maokai are also  stunned for 0.5 seconds and  knocked back up to 300 units based on their proximity to him.

0.text: Active: Maokai  dashes to the target enemy while being  untargetable, dealing them magic damage and  rooting them for a duration upon arrival.
Active: Maokai  flings a Sapling to the target location, granting  sight of the area.

1.text: Once landed, Saplings remain stationary for 30 seconds or until they react to the first nearby visible enemy, chasing them for up to 2.5 seconds. Saplings explode upon colliding with an enemy or when they expire, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon detonation, capped at 300 against non-champions, and  slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds.

scalingPartType: % per 100 ap of target's maximum health

2.text: Saplings placed in a  brush instead last 30 (+ 2.5% bonus health) seconds and deal double damage to struck targets over 3 instances as well as  revealing them for 3 seconds. The first instance of damage is dealt instantly and the second and third instances occur each 0.75 seconds thereafter. The total damage is capped at 600 against non-champions.

scalingPartType: % per 100 ap of target's maximum health
% per 100 ap of target's maximum health

0.text: Active: Maokai summons a colossal wall of 5 thorny brambles that slowly advances in the target direction, accelerating over time, each stopping when they collide with an enemy  champion.

1.text: Each bramble deals magic damage to enemies caught within and  roots them for 0.8 − 2.6 (based on distance traveled) seconds.

1.concerningText: Active: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave that travels forth in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through and  slowing them by 99% for 0.25 seconds.

2.concerningText: Active: Maokai  dashes to the target enemy while being  untargetable, dealing them magic damage and  rooting them for a duration upon arrival.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Coordinated Fire: Abilities that slow or immobilize enemy champions deal 36 − 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and mark them for 4 seconds. Allied champions that damage marked enemies consume the mark to deal 90 − 150 (based on ally's level) bonus magic damage and grant you and the triggering ally 20% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds (6 (per champion, starts upon mark application) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 15 ability power.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – COORDINATED FIRE: Abilities that  slow or  immobilize enemy champions deal 36 − 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and mark them for 4 seconds. Allied champions that damage marked enemies consume the mark to deal 90 − 150 (based on ally's level) bonus magic damage and grant you and the triggering ally 20% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds (6 (per champion, starts upon mark application) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Azakana Gaze: Dealing ability damage curses enemies, causing them to take「 4.8% of their maximum health as total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」「 1.2% of their maximum health as magic damage every second over 4 seconds. 」Gain 10 bonus armor and 10 bonus magic resistance while enemies are afflicted, both increased by 2.5 for each additional champion affected.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+650 health

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Vow: Designate the target enemy champion as your Nemesis and gain 1 stack of Vendetta every 2 seconds over 60 seconds, up to 30 stacks, resetting upon selecting a new Nemesis. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in combat with champions. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; Global range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – VOW: Designate the target enemy champion as your Nemesis and gain 1 stack of Vendetta every 2 seconds over 60 seconds, up to 30 stacks, resetting upon selecting a new Nemesis. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in combat with champions. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; Global range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Vendetta: Take 1% reduced damage per stack of Vendetta from your Nemesis, up to 30% reduced damage.
Unique – Vengeance: At maximum stacks, your Nemesis has 20% reduced tenacity while they are within 700 units of you.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – VENDETTA: Take 1% reduced damage per stack of Vendetta from your Nemesis, up to 30% reduced damage.
